name: proud-connect
description: Connect server generating NPM downloads badges by author
readme: # proud-connect Simple server returning NPM stats and badges by author username ![bahmutov badge](http://proud.herokuapp.com/bahmutov) Use Markdown ![bahmutov badge](http://proud.herokuapp.com/bahmutov) Or HTML to generate number of total NPM downloads in the last month. ## Small print Author: Gleb Bahmutov © 2013 [@bahmutov](https://twitter.com/bahmutov) [glebbahmutov.com](http://glebbahmutov.com) License: MIT - do anything with the code, but don't blame me if it does not work. Spread the word: tweet, star on github, click *endorse*, etc. Support: if you find any problems with this module, email / tweet / open issue on Github
